item.title: Now Can We Stop Pretending That It Was Republicans Who Shut Down the Government?
item.description: People who voted against reopening the government, denounced the vote, and vow to fight on were never against the shutdown.

item.title: Putting Our Humanity Above Politics
item.description: It’s necessary now, especially after last Tuesday’s election results in New York and elsewhere.

item.title: The Left May Owe Justice Jackson an Apology on SNAP Benefits
item.description: The justice played a bad hand about as well as it could be played.

item.title: Sergio Gor sworn in as U.S. ambassador to India
item.description: Sergio Gor was sworn in Monday as the U.S. ambassador to India and special envoy to South and Central Asia.

item.title: RFK Jr. Probes Health Dangers Of Offshore Wind Turbines
item.description: While offshore wind farms’ effect on marine life has garnered much attention, the human element has been largely neglected.
